item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

Biography Cuneyt Gurcan Akcora is a Postdoctoral Fellow in the departments of Computer Science and Statistics at the University of Texas at Dallas. He received his Ph.D. from UniversitÃ degli studi dell’Insubria, Italy, and his M.S. from State University of New York at Buffalo, USA, as a Fulbright Scholar. He has worked and collaborated with Yahoo! Research Barcelona, Qatar Computing Research Institute and Huawei Research, Turkey. His primary research interests are Data Science on Complex Networks and Graph Mining, with applications in online social networks and Blockchain networks.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Fall 2018 I am teaching the Statistical Methods for Data Science course at the University of Texas at Dallas. 86 Grad students from Statistics and Computer Science take this core Data Science specialization course. See the course description here. My office hours are Tuesday 11:00-12:00 at ECSS 3.205. Course material will be posted to the university course page.
